attributes.action: Stop extremists being allowed to demonstrate contempt for The British + Americans  on our own Land
attributes.additional_details: Extremist should not be allowed to Demonstrate and shout and display contempt for dead soldiers , soldiers who are alive and fighting , or indeed as recently seen , show contempt and disturb peaceful silences for the remeberance of the fallen victims in the 9/11 atrocities . They who show such disrespect do not deserve to live in the UK . Our troops protect this countries and the people who live here want them dead , extremists who live in the uk and Muslims who wish to burn our Flags do not deserve to live in the uk . Sign this petition to force the house of commons to address this situation .
